DOC.brief_title: REmoval Free Light Chains . A COmpaRison Three Different dialyzERs
DOC.detailed_description: Background . Immunoglobulin light chain classify middle molecule uremic toxins together β2M parathyroid hormon . They mean molecular weight 25,000 dalton monomer ( k free light chain ) approximately 50,000 dalton dimer ( lambda free light chain ) . Raised serum level polyclonal free light chain impair neutrophil function term : 1 ) inhibit chemotactic movement ; 2 ) reduce activation glucose uptake ; 3 ) inhibit apoptosis . Immunoglobulin light chain able interact B lymphocyte membrane lead activation transmembrane signal . The ensue impairment neutrophil function contribute chronic inflammation state uremic patient increase risk bacterial infection . Desjardins et al . demonstrate association free light chain level vascular calcification progression chronic kidney disease patient . Nonetheless , serum free light chain patient chronic kidney disease associate risk end stage renal disease death . It seem high flux PMMA membranes significantly reduce light chain level , presumably due adsorption . This behavior lead use PMMA removal monoclonal free light chain multiple myeloma . Preliminary report describe significant reduction free light chain also hemodiafiltration reinfusion endogenous ultrafiltrate ( on-line HFR ) . A recent paper Borrelli et al . report improvement chronic inflammation chronic online HFR dialysis patient . The aim crossover observational study compare free light chain removal three different hemodialysis filter cohort chronic dialysis patient affect multiple myeloma . Methods . One hundred sixty-three patient chronic hemodialysis Nephrology , Dialysis Transplantation Unit S.Orsola University Hospital Bologna consider study . The inclusion criterion free light chain value > 100 mg/L k chain > 50 mg/L lambda chain . These level choose arbitrarily cut-off level available literature assessment lower serum free light chain value hemodialysis patient end-stage renal disease . Other inclusion criterion : age > 18 year , absence < 200 ml/die residual diuresis , fistula central venous catheter blood flow > 250 ml/min . Exclusion criterion : intradialytic hypotension bicarbonate dialysis , multiple myeloma require double PMMA filter application , poly-allergy , HIV positivity . The filter use study : ) HFR17 ( Bellco , Mirandola , Italy ) , double chamber filter use online HFR . The first part filter consist polyphenylene high flux hemofilter ultrafiltration coefficient ( Kuf ) 28 ml/h/mmHg , surface area 0.7 m2 membrane cut-off value 35,000 dalton . The endogenous ultrafiltrate rate obtain automatically mean transmembrane pressure level hemofilter . These calculate two pressure sensor : first arterial bubble chamber second roller pump ultrafiltrate . The ultrafiltrate driven hemofilter 40 g neutral styrenic resin allow adsorb area 28,000 m2 . After adsorption , ultrafiltrate add whole blood , turn , pass second HFR17 filter , polyphenylene low flux filter ( Kuf 13 ml/h/mmHg , surface area 1.7 m2 ) weight loss diffusive depuration take place . ii ) PMMA ( Toray Filtryzer BK-F , Tokyo , Japan ) surface area 2.1 m2 , membrane cut-off value 20,000 dalton ultrafiltration coefficient ( Kuf ) 26 ml/h/mmHg . iii ) A conventional polysulfone membrane ( Fresenius F7HPS , Bad Homburg , Germany ) cut-off 11,500 dalton , Kuf 16 ml/h/mmHg surface area 1.7 m2 use control dialyzer . The patient enrol randomized two group treatment last six week . Group A : 1st 2nd week bicarbonate dialysis filter PMMA , 3rd 4th week filter HFR17 , 5th 6th week bicarbonate dialysis filter F7 . Group B : 1st 2nd week filter HFR17 , 3rd 4th week bicarbonate dialysis filter PMMA , 5th 6th week bicarbonate dialysis filter F7 . The dialysis session carry week 1 , 3 5 consider washout session week 2 , 4 6 assessment lambda k light chain , β2M , C reactive protein albumin schedule . Week number 1 washout period usual dialytic treatment patient enrol begin study . The check dialysis session midweek session blood drawn start dialysis ( time 0 ) , two hour ( time 120 ' ) dialysis end ( time 240 ' ) . All dialysis session last four hour . Mean blood flow 310±30 ml/min , mean ultrafiltration rate 700±200 ml/h , HFR endogenous ultrafiltrate rate 2.3±0.4 ml/h . Dialysate flow 500 ml/min . Low molecular weight heparin enoxaparin ( Clexane® , Sanofi , Milan , Italy ) use anticoagulation extracorporeal circuit . Doses 2000 IU ( patient < 50 kg body weight ) , 4000 IU ( patient 50 90 kg body weight ) 6000 IU ( patient > 90 kg body weight ) administer single bolus start dialysis . Fresenius 5008 Bellco Flexya dialysis machine use . The concentration k lambda light chain β2M measure nephelometry ( kit Freelite k/lambda , The Binding Site Group Ltd. , Birmingham , United Kingdom ; IIMAGE/IMMAGE 800 Beckman Coulter instrument , Brea California USA , Beckman Coulter β2M kit ) . Normal value : k light chain 3.3 -19.9 mg/L , lambda light chain 5.7-26.3 mg/L , β2M 0.7 - 2 mg/L . Molecular weight : k light chain : 22,500 dalton ; lambda light chain : 45,000 dalton ; β2M : 11,818 dalton . The reference range patient normal kidney function consider 0.26 1.65 accord Bourguignon et al.. CRP concentration measure turbidimetry ( CRPLX , Tina-quant C-Reactive-Protein ; Roche/Hitachi 902 analyzer ) . CRP normal value < 0.8 mg/dl , molecular weight 120,000 dalton . Albumin assess use common laboratory method . The reduction rate per session ( RRs ) calculate follow : RRs = ( Cpre- Cpost-corr ) / Cpre x 100 ( 1 ) Cpre predialysis solute level , Cpost-corr post-dialysis solute concentration . The value measure dialysis correct hemoconcentration due patient 's weight loss assume unicompartmental behavior light chain describe follow formula : Cpost-corr = Cpost/ { 1+ [ DeltaBW/ ( 0.2xBWpost ) ] } ( 2 ) Cpost-corr post-dialysis solute concentration Cpost-corr concentration light chain correct hemoconcentration , Delta body weight ( DeltaBW ) weight subtract dialysis , BW ( body weight ) body weight end dialysis . Statistical analysis . Statistical analysis perform use `` Statistical package social science ( SPSS ) '' statistical software . The data present mean ± standard error mean . The Shapiro-Wilk test , suitable small population , show non-normal distribution variable , non-parametric Friedman test use . The p value < 0.05 consider normal . The Wilcoxon Signed Rank Test subsequently use see pairwise comparison result statistically different . In addition , multiple comparison do , apply Bonferroni correction , thereby set p value = 0.05 / 3 = 0.0167 . For sample time 0.120 240 minute , compare result RRs obtain different filter ( HFR17 , PMMA , F7 ) .
DOC.criteria: chronic hemodialysis patient free light chain value > 100 mg/L k chain > 50 mg/L lambda chain . absence < 200 ml/die residual diuresis fistula central venous catheter blood flow > 250 ml/min . intradialytic hypotension multiple myeloma polyallergy HIV positivity
